name: Sproutland - Milestone 4
description:
This is my progress on my Milestone 4 for the Game Programming 2 project. In this milestone, I have implemented more sound effects, added more particles to the game, made improvements to UI, re-timed the moving platforms, and added a title screen that looks betterish. I've changed character interaction so you no longer press 'E' to interact, instead it just happens once you get near the NPCs or other collectible objects. I changed how the key looked and added collectible objects throughout the level. The UI shows your progress in collecting all the objects and outlines your missions and goals for the level. 

The outline for the level is still rough, but hopefully I will be able to implement more detail and interaction with this level.

Controls: 

W -> Move forward

S -> Move backward

Mouse -> look to go in the direction you want

Spacebar -> Jump
